Package swingtree.dialogs

Class ErrorDialogBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • swingtree.dialogs.ErrorDialogBuilder
  • public final class ErrorDialogBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable builder class for creating simple error info dialogs based on the JOptionPane class, more specifically the JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Component, Object, String, int, Icon) method.

    This class is intended to be used as part of the UI API by calling the UI.error() factory method.
